nodes.text: The Yadeez was a bulk freighter utilized as a carrier by the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing and commanded by Colonel Soran Keize. It was named for Fara Yadeez, Acting Governor of the planet Troithe, who had previously assisted the 204th before being taken into New Republic custody.

Following the 204th's escape from Troithe, Keize used the Yadeez as a command ship for the 204th's continued Operation: Cinder against factions that had broken away from the Empire. The 204th used the Yadeez through the Battle of Jakku.
The Yadeez first appeared in the novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed and published in 2020. It was named in the novel's 2021 sequel, Victory's Price, also written by Freed.
